alert.note: Alert for Crane; Glasscock; Midland; Mitchell; Pecos; Reagan; Scurry; Terrell; Upton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 26 at 8:17PM CDT until March 27 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR RELATIVE HUMIDITY LESS THAN 10%, 20-FT WINDS OF 20 MPH OR MORE, AND HIGH TO EXTREME FIRE DANGER FOR THE EASTERN PERMIAN BASIN AND LOWER TRANS PECOS... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM CDT SUNDAY... The National Weather Service in Midland/Odessa has issued a Red Flag Warning for the eastern Permian Basin and Lower Trans Pecos, which is in effect from noon to 9 PM CDT Sunday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Scurry, Mitchell, Midland, Glasscock, Crane, Upton, Reagan, Pecos and Terrell. * TIMING...Sunday afternoon through Sunday evening. * WINDS...South 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 5 percent. * RFTI...4 or near critical.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity and warm temperatures will increase potential for fire growth.

area.areaDesc: Crane; Glasscock; Midland; Mitchell; Pecos; Reagan; Scurry; Terrell; Upton
